title: Saving Mia
description: Hilmia Warner, or Mia as she preferred to be called, discovered at a young age that her world wasn’t as black and white as it seemed. This discovery made her want to change the reality she lived in. Becoming a rebel fighting for the Slums right to be equal wasn’t were she thought it would lead her. Nor did she think she’d end up in bed with a tattooed biker, and find herself living with his club. Only the violence of his world may be much worse than the one she left behind. How is a sheltered woman supposed to cope with the nightmare that seems determined to rip them apart?Ratchet Thompson didn’t plan on being a knight in shining armor. He didn’t want to save any damsels in distress, but something about Mia called to him. Finding her in trouble was the last thing he’d planned when he set out to get her into his bed. Now with the danger of all-out war with the Jackal’s looming over their heads. Can he claim her as his own, or will this battle rip them apart?
author: Michelle  Woods
